threat: A remote unauthenticated attacker could exploit this using the Nova API to cause a denial of service via resource exhaustion.
special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
  python-nova
2012.2.1+stable-20121212-a99a802e-0ubuntu1.2
Ubuntu 12.04 LTS:
  python-nova
2012.1.3+stable-20120827-4d2a4afe-0ubuntu1.2
Ubuntu 11.10:
  python-nova                     2011.3-0ubuntu6.12
In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
